comment.author: 76016463@N00
comment._content: This appears to be North Carolina politician John Motley Morehead II (1866-1923) ncpedia.org/biography/morehead-john-motley-ii bioguide.congress.gov/scripts/biodisplay.pl?index=M000940

comment.author: 66311327@N05
comment._content: A photo in The Caucasian., January 17, 1909, Image 6, col. 4 confirms that it's this man. Obviously he was elected to the Congress unintentionally.

comment.author: 63860770@N07
comment._content: artolog, thanks for locating Mr. Morehead's full name. We'll update our catalog record.
